CANNOT_BOOK_MORE_THAN_2_CLUB_EVENTS: You cannot book more than 2 club events at the same time. Cancel a booking to book another event, or wait until you have completed one.
CANNOT_JOIN_WAITLIST_MORE_THAN_2_CLUB_EV: You cannot sign up to more than 2 club events at the same time. Leave waitlist to sign up to another event
ALREADY_STARTED: This event has already started. You cannot book it now.
NO_MORE_SLOTS: There are no more slots available for this event.
ALREADY_BOOKED_OR_COMPLETED: You have already booked this event, or you have already completed it.
TOTAL_SLOTS_LESS_THAN_BOOKED: The total number of slots available for this event is less than the number of slots already booked.
START_DATE_MUST_BE_IN_THE_FUTURE: The date must be in the future.
END_DATE_MUST_BE_AFTER_START_DATE: The end date must be after the start date.
ALREADY_BOOKED_IN_WAITLIST: User is already booked and cannot join the waitlist.
ALREADY_IN_WAITLIST: User is already in the waitlist
NOT_IN_WAITLIST: User is not in the waitlist
CALENDAR_BLOCKED: Access to calendar events has been blocked
